details.title_en: The Estelle 1 bedroom condo for rent Ref.: 11658
details.description:
This is a luxury 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo available to rent at The Estelle Phrom Phong, Sukhumvit 26. The fully furnished condo measures 58 sqm and is situated on the 19th floor with a view from the spacious balcony. This unit has 3.15m high ceilings and Gaggaenau and Bosch appliances. The building only has 146 units and there is 130% parking, including Supercar spaces. 

 

The Estelle Phrom Phong has all the expected facilities including gym, swimming pool, lounge, parking and security service, and the local area is home to numerous places to eat, drink, shop and relax.

 

For more information and to arrange a viewing of this condo for rent in Bangkok, contact us at BKKCondos.

location.property-name: Scope Langsuan 2 bedroom condo for sale

details.title: Scope Langsuan 2 bedroom condo for sale Ref.: 11645
details.title_en: Scope Langsuan 2 bedroom condo for sale Ref.: 11645
details.description:
This is a 2 bedroom luxury condo for sale at SCOPE Langsuan, by Scope Company Limited. The freehold property measures a comfortable 162 sqm on the 12th floor and has 2 bedrooms with walk-in closets and en-suite bathrooms, a spacious living, dining and kitchen area and a powder room. SCOPE Langsuan has been designed to the highest standard and features the latest technology and exceptional services including Gaggenau 400 Series, Baulthaup Kitchens, housekeeping, valet and porter service, concierge, gym and pool managers, 145% parking and anti-dust auto-parking system.

 

In the local area you will find Central Chidlom, Central Embassy, Lumpini Park, Gaysorn Village, Velaa Sindorn Village Langsuan and Chidlom BTS Skytrain Station.

 

To arrange a viewing of this condo for sale in Bangkok or for more details contact us at BKKCondos.

This is a penthouse condo with large terrance available to rent at Hansar Rajdamri in central Bangkok.  The spacious property measures 350 sqm, comes fully furnished and has 2 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The penthouse boasts a large terrace and views over the Royal Bangkok Sports Club and surrounding area.

 

Hansar Rajdamri has a swimming pool, gym, lounge, restaurant, parking and security service and the local area is home is to shopping malls, parks, restaurants, hotels and a BTS Skytrain Station.

 

For more details or to arrange a viewing of this penthouse for rent in Bangkok, contact us at BKKCondos.
